name: Hot Tub Simulator
description:
Become the most popular hot tub streamer starting from scratch. Gain subscribers and make your channel grow.

  • Customize your avatar to be like your favourite streamer or the streamer you always wanted to be!

  • Unlock cute bikinis and change them on stream to gain your viewer's attention!

  • Gain money through subscriptions and unlock new places to stream!

  • Unlock skills to satisfy your audience and make the stream more interesting!

  • Write your subsriber's names on the whiteboard!

  • Ignore your viewers while you are on your phone and still make money!
